name: Mango FAQs
author: Justin Comino

sections.description:
PLEASE contact me with ANY questions or feature requests!

Mango FAQs allows you to automatically reply to emails from your customers, with suggested answers pulled from your FAQs.

This plugin automatically determines what the most related Frequently Asked Questions are, and sends an email to the customer notifying them their question has been received, including the suggested answers.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Activate it from the “Plugins” screen
  3. Add your FAQs under Settings->Mango FAQs
  4. Place your Mango FAQs contact form using the shortcode [mango-contact]
sections.faq:
Do I need to fill out the FAQ?

Yes, you will need to fill out the FAQ list in order for this plugin to work.

Do you have XXX feature?

Not yet, but if you email me I will be happy to implement it for you.
